current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to
		  provide for coverage, as supplies associated with the injection of insulin, of
		  containment, removal, decontamination and disposal of home-generated needles,
		  syringes, and other sharps through a sharps container,
		  decontamination/destruction device, or sharps-by-mail program or similar
		  program under part D of the Medicare program.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was read twice and referred to the

short-title.#text:
Medicare Safe Needle Disposal
			 Coverage Act of 2013

text.#text:
This Act may be cited as
			 the

header.#text:
Coverage of
			 containment, removal, decontamination and disposal of home-generated needles,
			 syringes, and other sharps through a sharps container,
			 decontamination/destruction device, or sharps-by-mail program or similar
			 program under Medicare part D

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
for the safe and effective
			 containment, removal, decontamination and disposal of home-generated needles,
			 syringes, and other sharps through a sharps container,
			 decontamination/destruction device, or sharps-by-mail program or similar
			 program

quote.#text:
and including devices approved for
			 home use by the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 1860D–2(e)(1)(B) of the Social Security Act
